title: Action Research Workshop to Enhance Workplace Adaptability for Science Field Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Expertise in Scientific Fields and Management Experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening workplace adaptability (resilience, leadership competencies) for science field managers through project-based assessments in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Participants can utilize at least three practical stress management strategies through action research based on real workplace scenarios
Through team projects, learners can design collaborative decision-making processes for scientific problem-solving in changing work environments with 80% accuracy
Learners can diagnose their personal leadership style and develop improvement plans through reflective journaling and peer feedback

resources: Case study materials for science disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
